title: Update Our Team member names across the UI

requirements.summary: Replace the displayed Our Team member names (Priya Sharma → Prayag Dhole, Rajesh Kumar → Sagar Dhole) anywhere they appear in the UI, including OurTeamSection data.
acceptanceCriteria: In the rendered Our Team section, the member previously shown as "Priya Sharma" is now displayed as "Prayag Dhole".
In the rendered Our Team section, the member previously shown as "Rajesh Kumar" is now displayed as "Sagar Dhole".
There are no remaining occurrences of the strings "Priya Sharma" or "Rajesh Kumar" in user-visible team member listings/cards.

file_operations.description: Update the hardcoded team member names: replace "Rajesh Kumar" with "Sagar Dhole" and replace "Priya Sharma" with "Prayag Dhole" in the teamMembers data used to render team cards.

requirements.summary: Ensure every page that renders a team section shows the updated names consistently (no page shows old names).
acceptanceCriteria: Every page/route that renders a team section shows the updated names ("Prayag Dhole" and "Sagar Dhole").
No page that includes a team section shows the old names.

file_operations.description: Create a single shared team data source exporting the Our Team member list with the updated names ("Prayag Dhole" and "Sagar Dhole") so all team sections across the app can reference the same content.
Refactor OurTeamSection to import team member data from frontend/src/config/team.ts (instead of local hardcoding) to guarantee consistent names wherever the team section is used.
